case.title: Profile avatar

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized & non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Go to Global Feed 2. Click on avatar of article's author
custom.expected: On click on the author's profile, displays a profile of author

case.title: Tag's banner

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized & non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Take a look at banner "Popular tags" 2. Click on any tag
custom.expected: Click on link displays articles which include that tag

case.title: "Need an account" text links to sign up page

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: Link "Need an account" redirects to sign up page

case.title: User can input/copy/paste text in email/username field

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: It's possible for the user to input/copy/paste text and special symbols (".", "_", "@")

case.title: Error: "Email/username field can't be blank"

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: When user tries to leave field empty, error message "Email/username field can't be blank" appears

case.title: Error: "Email isn't correct"

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: When user tries to enter email, that isn't registered in DB, error message "Email isn't correct" appears.

case.title: Error: "Username isn't correct"

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: When user tries to input incorrect username (text without "@"), error message "Username isn't correct" appears.

case.title: User can fill the field

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: It's possible for the user to fill the field

case.title: Error: "Password isn't correct"

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: When user tries to input password, which doesn't match the password in DB for this email/username, error message "Password isn't correct" appears.

case.title: Error: "Password field can't be blank"

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: When user tries to leave the password field empty, error message "Password field can't be blank" appears.

case.title: Password masking

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: When user input anything in the password field, it masks into special symbols "*"

case.title: User can sign in

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: Authorization is possible if the user tries to input email/username and matching password which were registered in the DB

case.title: User can't sign in if email isn't correct

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: Authorization is impossible if the user tries to input email which wasn't registered in the DB

case.title: User can't sign in if username isn't correct

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: Authorization is impossible if the user tries to input username which wasn't registered in the DB

case.title: User can't sign in if password isn't correct

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.expected: Authorization is impossible if the user tries to input password which doesn't match inputted email/username

case.title: Username

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Take a look at the header 2. Click on "Sign up" link 3. Fill in field "Username" following rules: - min 4 letters - max 36 letters - only Latin characters - using spec symbols “ - _ “ - no using Register sensitive - name must be unique
custom.expected: User can input field following rules If user break rule, error message will be shown

case.title: Email field

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Pass the "C12" test case (Username) 2. Fill in field "Email" following rules: - the format of the email must be [name]@[domain].[top-domain] - email must be unique
custom.expected: User can fill field following rules If user break rules, error message will be shown

case.title: Password field

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Pass the "C12" and "C13" test cases (username and email) 2. Fill in field password following rules: - it must include min 4 and max 30 letters - there must be at least one symbol, one integer, capital letter
custom.expected: User can fill field following rules If user break rule, error message will be shown

case.title: User registration

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Take a look at the header 2. Click on "Sign up" link 3. Pass "C12" test case (username) 4. Pass "C13" test case (email) 5. Pass "c14" test case (password) 6. Fill in "Repeat Password" field 7. Click on the button [Sign up]
custom.expected: 1. User can register following rules 2. User can't register not following rules

case.title: Github link

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized & non-authorized
custom.steps: 1. Take a look at the footer 2. Click on "Fork on Github" link
custom.expected: Banner links to GitHub repository

case.title: Like

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.steps: 1. Click on "Global feed" link 2. Find any created article 3. Click on [Like] button
custom.expected: +1 like to article like counter

case.title: Write a comment

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.steps: 1. Go to "Global Feed" 2. Click on any article 3. Click on the "Write a comment..." banner 4. Fill required field 5. Click on the [Post comment] button
custom.expected: The comment appeared under the post

case.title: User can publish article inputting letters, numbers, special characters, spaces (if it not the first or few in a row) in Article title field

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.expected: Article will be published

case.title: Error "Article title can't consider more than 240 symbols"

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.expected: If user typed more than 240 symbols in the article field. error message "Article title can't consider more than 240 symbols" will appear

custom.expected: If user typed spaces at the beginning, error message "Article title can consider spaces only if it not first and few in a row" will appear

custom.expected: If user left field empty or typed less than 5 sympols, error message "Title of article can’t be empty (minimum 5 symbols)" will appear

case.title: Check if user can create and publish a post

custom.preconds: Operation system: any Resolution: any Browser: Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, Opera, Safari Authorization: authorized
custom.steps: 1. Take a look at the footer 2. Click on "New post" link 3. Pass all sub-cases 4. Click on the [Publish article] button
custom.expected: Article will be shown in user's profile and global feed and user will be redirected to the user's page

case.title: User profile settings

custom.steps: 1. Take a look at the header 2. Click on your username 3. Click on [Edit profile settings] button 4. Edit all fields 5. Click on the [Update settings] button
custom.expected: User settings were updated
